scripts.lint: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cp=require('child_process');function walk(dir){for(const e of fs.readdirSync(dir,{withFileTypes:true})){const p=path.join(dir,e.name);if(e.isDirectory()) walk(p); else if(e.isFile() && p.endsWith('.js')) cp.execFileSync(process.execPath,['--check',p],{stdio:'inherit'});}}['src','tests'].forEach((d)=>{if(fs.existsSync(d)) walk(d);});"
